name: Little Falling Boxes
description:
FULLSCREEN IN BROWSER TO SEE MENU

So as it turns out, making essential two games, in 72 hours, as a novice is ill-advised. The limitation of this jam was 2 genres. So of course I put two games on top of each other. The idea is to work two different areas of your brain at once. The part that can handle simple repetitive tasks and the critical thinking part. It took WAY longer than I thought to get just the mechanics working so the result you see here is a rather short game.

ENJOY!

CONTROLS

Click & Drag boxes to sort them

1,2,3: To Select A Game Piece

WASD/Arrow Keys : To Move A Game Piece

RULES

Drag the colored cubes in portals of the same color. At the same time, use lighter color game pieces to jump the darker ones. If a lighter piece jumps a darker piece, it can jump again.
